en.title: FusionExcel Expands into Queensland, Australia!
en.content:
FE EXPANDS INTO QUEENSLAND AUSTRALIA - BEAUTIFUL ONE DAY PERFECTS THE NEXT! 

REPORT BY AUSTRALIA COUNTRY LICENSEE VASU.

FE in Australia recently organized two events as part of its continued expansion into Queensland. The first and major event was the 3 days Body Mind Spirit Festival in Brisbane, followed by a smaller 2 days community display at Maleny, north of Brisbane. It was the first time FE was taking part at the BMS Brisbane event over a three days weekend - Friday to Sunday 28th – 30th June 2009. Over ten thousand people attended the Body Mind Spirit Festival and it was a great success with many Queenslanders expressing amazement and astonishment with FE's Quantum Pendant and the demostrations. The Australian expressions ‘it is weird…., did you see that.., I can’t believe it.., come and try this…, you must try this…’ were commonly and continually heard throughout the 3 days festival at the RNA show grounds. 

There were some pleasant and great feedbacks from past customers as well. Quite a few customers who purchased FE's Quantum Pendants at the Gold Coast Expo in Jan this year dropped in at the booth to convey their very high level of satisfaction with the benefits obtained since wearing them. It was thumbs up all the way. AHOO! AHOO!! AHOO!!! 

Several new FE members and leaders made this event a success: Ron & Lyn Nolan, Maria, Che Anrossi, Roy, New Zealand Country Licensee Josy Doyle, Julie Parr, Yi Ying, Hillary and Cate. Special mention of appreciation is made to Ron Nolan for his assistance with the logistics for this inaugural Brisbane event. 

Ron, Lyn and Maria then moved north to Maleny, Queensland to stage the FE community display on Tuesday and Wednesday (1st & 2nd July) at Manley's community booth in the heart of the Sunshine Coast Hinterland. Situated approximately 450 meters (1,450 feet) above sea level, Maleny has a sub-tropical climate with cool clear winters and warm wet summers and Maleny residents are very environmentally conscious. A steady stream of local residents and visitors to Maleny experienced the demonstrations with FE's Quantum Pendant and as usual drew a very good response. Many residents said they could feel the energy from the QP just by holding it in the palms of their hand. The community display is expected to become a monthly event. Congratulations to Ron, Lyn and Maria for planning and organizing this event, which is expected to be a monthly occasion for the benefit of Maleny residents and visitors alike.
